SELECT A.BOARD_ID , A.TITLE , TO_CHAR(A.REGIST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DISPLAY_REGIST_DT , A.UPDATE_NM , A.SECRET_YN , (SELECT CD_NM FROM CD WHERE A.HEADER_SE_CD = CD) AS HEADER_SE_NM , A.ANSWER_YN , A.ATCH_DOC_ID FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM INQUIRY WHERE 1 = 1
AND REGEXP_LIKE(TITLE, #{searchKeyword})
AND REGEXP_LIKE(CONTENT, #{searchKeyword})
AND (REGEXP_LIKE(TITLE, #{searchKeyword}) OR REGEXP_LIKE(CONTENT, #{searchKeyword}))
AND REGEXP_LIKE(UPDATE_NM, #{searchKeyword})
ORDER BY REGIST_DT DESC , BOARD_ID DESC ) A ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN #{firstRecordNumber} AND #{lastRecordNumber}

SELECT COUNT(1) AS RECORD_COUNT FROM INQUIRY WHERE 1 = 1
AND REGEXP_LIKE(TITLE, #{searchKeyword})
AND REGEXP_LIKE(CONTENT, #{searchKeyword})
AND (REGEXP_LIKE(TITLE, #{searchKeyword}) OR REGEXP_LIKE(CONTENT, #{searchKeyword}))
AND REGEXP_LIKE(UPDATE_NM, #{searchKeyword})

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_ID , TITLE , CONTENT , WRITER_NM , SECRET_YN , PASSWORD , HEADER_SE_CD , (SELECT CD_NM FROM CD WHERE HEADER_SE_CD = CD) AS HEADER_SE_NM , TEL_NO , ANSWER_YN , ATCH_DOC_ID , LAG(BOARD_ID, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY REGIST_DT DESC, BOARD_ID DESC) AS NEXT_BOARD_ID , LAG(TITLE, 1, '다음 글이 없습니다.') OVER(ORDER BY REGIST_DT DESC, BOARD_ID DESC) AS NEXT_BOARD_TITLE , LAG(SECRET_YN, 1) OVER(ORDER BY REGIST_DT DESC, BOARD_ID DESC) AS NEXT_BOARD_SECRET_YN , LEAD(BOARD_ID, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY REGIST_DT DESC, BOARD_ID DESC) AS PREV_BOARD_ID , LEAD(TITLE, 1, '이전 글이 없습니다.') OVER(ORDER BY REGIST_DT DESC, BOARD_ID DESC) AS PREV_BOARD_TITLE , LEAD(SECRET_YN, 1) OVER(ORDER BY REGIST_DT DESC, BOARD_ID DESC) AS PREV_BOARD_SECRET_YN , REGIST_DT , TO_CHAR(REGIST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DISPLAY_REGIST_DT , UPDATE_NM , UPDATE_DT FROM INQUIRY ) A WHERE A.BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
